Docs.typeparam: The type of body in the InvokeResponse.
Docs.param: The oauth audience scope, used during token retrieval. (Either https://api.botframework.com or bot app id.)
The MicrosoftAppId of the bot sending the activity.
The skill to create the conversation Id for.
The callback Url for the skill host.
Docs.summary: Uses the SkillConversationIdFactory to create or retrieve a Skill Conversation Id, and sends the activity.
